titles.title: On Thee my heart is resting

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}On Thee my heart is resting, Ah, this is rest indeed: What else, Almighty Savior, Can a poor sinner need?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}On Thee my heart is resting, Ah, this is rest indeed: What else, Almighty Savior, Can a poor sinner need? Thy light is all my wisdom, Thy love is all my stay; Thy coming back in glory, Draws nearer every day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When clouds are darkest round me, Thou, Lord, art then most near, My drooping faith to quicken, My weary soul to cheer. Safe nestling in Thy bosom, I gaze upon Thy face; In vain my foes would drive me From Thee, my hiding-place.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}’Tis Thou hast made me happy, ’Tis Thou hast set me free; To whom shall I give glory Forever, but to Thee? Of earthly love and blessing Should every stream run dry, Thy grace shall still be with me, Thy grace, to live and die.{/lang-eng}
